title: Nike Shoe Shop
shortDescription: A stylish homepage for a Nike shoe store, designed from Figma.
description: A practice homepage for a Nike shoe shop, featuring a modern, responsive design with a focus on clean UI and product display. Converted from a Figma mockup to showcase front-end skills.

title: Hiking Site
shortDescription: A scenic homepage for a hiking brand with mountain visuals.
description: A practice homepage inspired by mountain aesthetics, designed from a Figma mockup. Features a responsive layout and engaging visuals to promote hiking adventures.

title: Home Consoles
shortDescription: A gaming-themed homepage for home consoles.
description: A practice homepage for a gaming console brand, built from a Figma design. Showcases a vibrant, responsive UI tailored for gaming enthusiasts.

title: Designer Portfolio
shortDescription: A sleek homepage for a designer’s portfolio.
description: A practice homepage for a fictional designer’s portfolio, converted from Figma. Features a clean, modern design to highlight creative work.

title: Roomvibe
shortDescription: A responsive e-commerce site for room decor.
description: A fully responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce platform for room decor, featuring affiliate links to Amazon, AliExpress, and Temu. Includes product pages, inspiration, and a blog.

title: SimplifAI
shortDescription: A platform to find AI tools for specific needs.
description: A fully responsive, SEO-friendly site helping users discover AI tools tailored to their problems. Features a clean UI and intuitive navigation, designed and built from scratch.

title: Tapnglow
shortDescription: An e-commerce site for lifestyle products.
description: A fully responsive, SEO-friendly platform offering clothes, accessories, room decor, and more to enhance users’ lives. Designed and built with a focus on user experience and aesthetics.
